title: Gorgeous Bright Spacious true 4 bed 2 bath !
posting_body: ['Hi there,', 'I have a gorgeous true 4 beds 2 full baths available AUGUST 1ST.', 'Ground floor with private backyard in the heart of the East Village 13th and Ave A for $6900', 'Great location near all the best restaurants, pubs, roof tops and the L subway.', 'walking distance to Union Square to all trains that take you to the upper east side, midtown east side.', 'Walking distance to Gramercy and Kips Bay, buses to Murray Hill, L train to Brooklyn 5 min.', 'away.', 'Apartments feature exposed brick, large bedrooms that fit queen beds and have windows and closets.', ' Massive living room space.', 'The apartment get tons of light, has a large living room area, the kitchen features a dishwasher, stainless steel appliances and has a portable washer and dryer in unit.', ' Intercom buzz camera system.', 'One of them has a private backyard.', 'Available August 1st.', '1 year lease', 'No sublet or short term', 'Credit required', 'USA guarantors accepted', 'Broker fee', 'Strictly no pets.', 'Call or text for video!', 'Allie', '718-614-7104']
